text: 6.18: Ro 1.24; 6.12-13; 1 Te 4.3; Hi 13.4Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nde ruarir gumgi gu mbigi wari ndi tɨva thav rɨɨv ŋgɨp samra kɨri. Mba harigi tɨvi mbatɨgi zam, gumgi nta mbui nta gumgi kɨrar wari won fhavi ndirar mbui tɨvi mbatɨgi ma. Guma ana ruarir mbigi gu gumgi wari ndi, ana tɨva mbatɨgar won fhavara mbui.
